name: @antonytm/mcp-sitecore-server
description: A Model Context Protocol server for Sitecore

scripts.start:sse: npm run build && cross-env TRANSPORT=sse node dist/index.js
scripts.start:streamable-http: npm run build && cross-env TRANSPORT=streamable-http node dist/index.js
scripts.start:stdio: npm run build && cross-env TRANSPORT=stdio node dist/index.js
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run bundle && vitest run
scripts.docker:windows:push: docker push antonytm/mcp-sitecore-windows:0.21.0 && docker push antonytm/mcp-sitecore-windows:latest
scripts.docker:windows: npm run docker:windows:build && npm run docker:windows:push
scripts.docker:linux:push: docker push antonytm/mcp-sitecore-linux:0.21.0 && docker push antonytm/mcp-sitecore-linux:latest
scripts.docker:linux: npm run docker:linux:build && npm run docker:linux:push
